column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Hilary Tolkien]]'''.

column1: *'''Contents:''' Tolkien refers to the celebration of [[wikipedia:Guy Fawkes Night|Guy Fawkes Night]]
column2: and "one will notice the conspicuous use of some distinctly Tolkienian vernacular"<ref>[[Jason Fisher]]
column3: "[http://lingwe.blogspot.com/2010/04/another-of-my-reviews-goes-online.html Another of my reviews goes online]" (Blog entry

column1: *'''Publication:''' An excerpt from the letter was published in ''[[Black & White Ogre Country]]''.
